xstampp.ui.navigation

Interface IProjectSelection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelector, CategorySelector, ProjectSelector, StepSelector

    public interface IProjectSelection
extends org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection
    Describes a project item selection in a tree and provides an interface for the interaction with it
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukas Balzer
